name: Dr. Bethany MacLeod
bio: Dr. MacLeod takes an experimental approach to her research, combining production and perception studies to better understand the nature of phonetic variability. She teaches both undergraduate and graduate courses at Carleton University and currently serves as Associate Director of Linguistics, Secretary of the Faculty of Arts and Social Science Executive, and a member of Senate.
